title: Lost and found ECC
content: where do i enquire about something i lost in class. (couldnt find it the next day)

comments.body:
I took it away.
If u want it back, get me a biryani.
In RR, there is a lost and found room on every floor. There must be similar lost and found rooms in ECC too. Ask any aaya-amma there and they may guide you.

Anything that the cleaners find, they'll give to the people at the reception. Go ask there once. If you need an extra calculator also, u can go ask them. There's also a small room on the right on the way to canteen in the 5th floor. You can ask there too
